_description: A carol to Christ, with refrain, ‘Miserere mei’ — three 5-line stanzas (aaaaa) plus burden: ‘Ihesu fili dei / Miserere mei’

BLAdd5665.First Lines: Glorius god in triniteWell of man & pyte…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…So y pray thou haue vn meGlorius god in triniteMiserere
                    mei
